message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $110. I think it would be very valuable to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $95. Let me know if this works for you.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $95 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $105?
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I understand your position, but I can't go above $100 for this product. Let me know if this revised offer suits you.
